name: shellfilter
short_description:
(Under development)
Estimated time of publishing : October 2015

Configurable command filtering agent.

User input is scrutinised before feeding into bash.

Original implementation was in bash script, changed to C due to technical complications, and more control over the process if done in C.

Update(1 Mar 2015):
Working on derived project which will be used in this project later.

Update(5 Dec 2014):
One major component(for handling data structure) has been finished and tested, now the work will focus on the input interpretation and input analysis.

All components will be published along with main code, so no code will be published prior to release.

Estimated project delivery time may be in late December rather than February.

Implementation is still fully written in C, with aim of high portability across other potential platform.
